examples: she felt a stab of excitement

definitions.text: a strong blow with a knife or other sharp pointed instrument
examples: one strong stab to the heart killed him

definitions.text: informal words for any attempt or effort
examples: he gave it his best shot
he took a stab at forecasting
The victim was knifed to death
he jabbed the piece of meat with his pocket knife
he jabbed his finger into her ribs
